original_text: A man ought not to cover his head, since he is the image and glory of God; but woman is the glory of man.
korean_text: 남자는 하나님의 형상과 영광이니 그 머리를 마땅히 가리지 않거니와 여자는 남자의 영광이니라

sentences.original_text: A man ought not to cover his head
since he is the image and glory of God
but woman is the glory of man
